overview: A hungry spirit in the night. A breathless voice in ecstasy. The one and oly. The woman of your dreams. She is the goddess, the ultimate fantasy ... She is the spirit of Erotika. Not just a beautiful vision or a burning desire, but a way of being and perceiving the world. What heavenly powers make someone so ethereal, yet so lustful? What magic of hell makes seduction so divine?
tagline: A Passion for Life...A Burning Desire
title: Erotika
